content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: So, Mr. Abbasi, what do you think is a fair rental price for this apartment?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a great question, Mr. Abbasi. I'm looking to get the highest price possible for my apartment. Please, make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering that the apartment is unfurnished and in the city center, I think a fair rental price would be 500 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Abbasi. However, I'm looking to get a higher price. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Taking into account the location and size of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 550 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a better offer, Mr. Abbasi. But I believe my apartment is worth more. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the facilities near the apartment, I suggest a rental price of 600 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a fair offer, Mr. Abbasi. I believe my apartment is worth more. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Taking into account the condition of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 650 euros.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: That's a good offer, Mr. Abbasi. But I believe my apartment is worth more. Please, make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
